availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Young. Father of Ben Young, Lousinia Young, and Joe Young. Owned eight enslaved persons in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette county, 1st ward, city of Lexington, p. 108.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1.
